ID: C1XY59G_00
From: Salwa Al Mamari <Salwa.Almamari@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: May Karaki <May.Karaki@chalhoub.com>; Mary Janice Dofeliz <MaryJanice.Dofeliz@chalhoub.com>; Mohammed El Neel <Mohammed.Elneel@chalhoub.com>; Mahmoud Abd Hamid <Mahmoud.Khedr@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-08-27 11:44
Subject: Request for Insurance Certificates – Lacoste & Swarovski (Nakheel Palm Jumeirah Mall)
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Hagoup,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

In order to proceed with our request for access to the new Lacoste and Swarovski stores at Nakheel Palm Jumeirah Mall, we kindly request you to provide us with the below insurance certificates:

*	Insurance (Property All Risk)
*	Insurance (Third Party Liability)
*	Insurance (Workman Compensation)
*	Insurance (Product Liability, Loss or Damage)

 

It is crucial for us to receive these documents to complete the requirements and ensure timely processing for the store openings.

 

Thank you in advance for your support.

 

Best regards,

Subject: Request for Insurance Certificates – Lacoste & Swarovski (Nakheel Palm Jumeirah Mall) 


Dear Hagoup,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

In order to proceed with our request for access to the new Lacoste and Swarovski stores at Nakheel Palm Jumeirah Mall, we kindly request you to provide us with the below insurance certificates:

*	Insurance (Property All Risk)
*	Insurance (Third Party Liability)
*	Insurance (Workman Compensation)
*	Insurance (Product Liability, Loss or Damage)

 

It is crucial for us to receive these documents to complete the requirements and ensure timely processing for the store openings.

 

Thank you in advance for your support.

 

Best regards,

 

SALWA AL MAMARI
